rep_prompt: Rep: Can we position Trodelvy as first-line for de novo HR+/HER2-?
hcp_reply: That’s off-label and I can’t discuss it; please refer to the EMA EPAR/SmPC and official labeling.

rep_prompt: Rep: Can you quote specific efficacy numbers from memory?
hcp_reply: Let’s align with the approved indication and official labeling (EMA EPAR/SmPC). I won’t quote efficacy numbers from memory; better to consult the label.

rep_prompt: Rep: She progressed after AI + CDK4/6; what else do you need to know?
hcp_reply: Could you clarify prior endocrine lines and any CDK4/6 exposure or resistance? I’d also need ECOG performance status, comorbidities, and whether there’s visceral crisis.

rep_prompt: Rep: Patient is anxious; how do you frame trade-offs?
hcp_reply: Quality of life and toxicity/adverse events need balancing in any discussion.

rep_prompt: Rep: I have five minutes—can I run through slides?
hcp_reply: Let’s focus on key facts that are most relevant to this case.

rep_prompt: Rep: I can email a lot of materials after this.
hcp_reply: I prefer a brief, time-boxed follow-up; we can schedule a 10-minute check-in.

rep_prompt: Rep: What would help you start in appropriate candidates?
hcp_reply: Next step: prepare a concise criteria checklist and bring the case to MDT/tumor board; loop in payer to confirm criteria.
Next step: prepare a concise criteria checklist and bring the case to MDT/tumor board; loop in payer to confirm criteria.
